content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To enable rich communication between EPAM Systems management, employees and Customers there is a decision to implement Skype as a company's standard instant messaging tool till the time when it will be replaced with another.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SkypeIn and SkypeOut functions allow calls from landline and cellular phones to Skype and from Skype to landline and cellular phones. These functions should be used for EPAM business-related activities only in cases when EPAM VOIP cannot be used for solving tasks and require budget delegation from particular project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM computers should have Skype Business version installed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your Skype account should have EPAM email address specified to enable easy contacts search.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The procedure of Skype Deployment and usage policy is described in [WISD]\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://ephubudvsd0087.budapest.epam.com/pal/pal_method_plugin/guidances/whitepapers/doc_WIIT_SkypeDeployment_68E8F6A7.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skype Deployment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The latest versions of Skype provide a good facility to share the screens, which might be helpful in the process of support service provision:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8566fd50-73d9-447b-8ba5-659829c9221c/image2014-10-6%2018:48:16.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":408,\"height\":336}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
